name: Mad Quad
description:
MAD QUAD is both exciting and quite difficult arcade the gameplay of which focuses not only on jumping at platforms but on skillful interaction with physics. Remember that if you cube rolls over in the flight, your game view will literally roll over too.

Never ending obstacle course won’t let you get bored in the subway, cab or public transport, whereas physics-based cube flips make each of you round unique.

This game supports the touch screen controls so, you can play this game to a awesome hard-bass soundtrack, using the familiar touch controls like in a similar game genres.

Quick features:

  • Endless game level, which will give you a really challenge and will test your skills
  • The powerful hurd-bass soundtrack will't get you feel bored
  • MAD QUAD have beauty procedurally generated red background, which will please your eyes
  • This game supports the touch controls, so you can play it using your windows tablet.
